channel.title: Swedish Tech Events
channel.description: Events for developers, technologists, and other geeks in Sweden

item.title: 2022-01-26 08:00 This weeks Lean Coffee - Stockholm Lean Coffee
item.description: Like to limit WIP (Work-In-Process), visualization of workflows and self-organizing teams? Want to meet others like you and learn more about Lean and Agile? We are few enthusiasts who meet every Wednesday morning since May 2010, to exchange thoughts and experiences over a cup ...

item.title: 2022-03-09 18:00 Afterwork Hacking @ Comfort Hotel Westeras - Västerås Coffee and Code
item.description: Vi träffas på Comfort hotell bredvid järnvägsstationen 18:00 på onsdagar. Gå med i våran Slack för att kolla om det kommer någon just denna onsdag, kanalen kodkvällar. Eller varför inte bara diskutera något datorrelaterat online.
